10-06-2003, 07:24 AM #1 lors View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Join Date Dec 2002 Posts 347 $20 Coupon Kincaid's Steakhouse $20 Coupon Kincaid's Steakhouse
For years we've been known as the place to make memories. To help you create your own we'd like to extend this"$20 Kincaid's Makes it Memorable"offer, a promotion that allows our Guests to make a new memory while we pick up the first $20 of their bill. Just a few steps and we'll get you on your way.
Please note: Your coupon will be sent to you within 24 hours.
http://www.kincaids.com/promo_memories.php
Borrowed Thanks OP's Reply With Quote 10-06-2003, 10:02 AM #2 CGard View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2003 Location Oceanside Posts 638 Limited areas..locations are:
Bloomington, MN Burlingame, CA Honolulu, HI Norfolk, VA Oakland, CA Phoenix, AZ Redondo Beach, CA St. Paul, MN
Sounds yummy though..good deal! Reply With Quote 10-06-2003, 12:23 PM #3 ticklish1 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles november Join Date Mar 2002 Location In My Lil' Grass Shack Posts 3,435 Thanks so much!! What a great deal!! :D No minimum is required, either. This is what came by email:
Xxxxx,
Thanks for participating in the '$20 Kincaid's Makes it Memorable' offer. We're looking forward to seeing you!
All you have to do is print out this email (if printed on two pages, bring both pages in) and present it to your server when you dine with us. We will deduct $20 from your dinner bill. It's that easy!
Space is limited, visit us to make your reservation: http://kin.r-u-i.com/resv.php
Michelle Glarner, GM Kincaid's Honolulu (808) 591-2005
Please note: This offer is for Xxxxx Xxxxx only and expires on 11/05/2003. Coupon may only be used once, valid picture ID may be required at time of redemption. Only one coupon per table. No cash value. Not valid with any other offer. Not valid for First Seating Program. Coupon #XXXXXXXXX. Reply With Quote 10-06-2003, 03:27 PM #4 3Princesses View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Aug 2001 Location Arizona Posts 923 If you sign up for this newsletter, they send great coupons all the time: for referrals, your birthday, and other times.
Thanks, OP. Reply With Quote 12-05-2003, 04:59 AM #5 ticklish1 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles november Join Date Mar 2002 Location In My Lil' Grass Shack Posts 3,435 Check Your Emails! Another $20 GC is being awarded just for referring five people/email addresses. Certificate arrives immediately after you submit the info. Expiration date is 30 days from date of email. No minimum purchase required, valid for dinner only. Reply With Quote
